## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4dbc9f6e5e9e0431b9ed3c083a14b1940a6ed4e7e71c90c5dcb9e72b9ffa90ab)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'usss' @ 94.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
